faq.question: What's the catch? Why is the program free?
faq.answer: All we ask is that you are committed to using Sanctum and sharing your feedback. If you don't use Sanctum or ghost our program, we will happily replace your spot with another partner in our waitlist.

faq.question: What kind of support can we expect during beta?
faq.answer: Direct access to our development team, custom implementation support, and priority feature requests consideration.

faq.question: Do we need to integrate with Nurl Play?
faq.answer: No, but it's available if you want to gather direct player feedback and usage data.

faq.question: How long is the beta period?
faq.answer: Ideally, a quarter of the year depending on how quickly we can reach our satisfaction level.

faq.question: What happens after beta?
faq.answer: Beta partners are converted to the free tier and maintain their direct support channel.
